website_summaries.verdict: The Monster iClarityHD Precision Micro Bluetooth Speaker 100 delivers excellent sound quality and even includes a microphone for hands-free teleconferencing with a Bluetooth smartphone, but we can't recommend a $120 accessory when Logitech and Creative offer a similar product for less.
pros: Two 35mm drivers provide clear sound with ample bass

customer_reviews.title: Excellent speaker 4 years after purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker over 4 years ago and its still chugging along. I use it all over the house but primarily in the bathroom. I've unplugged it and placed it between the inner/outer shower curtain many times and the moisture hasn't killed it yet. I typically leave it plugged into a wall charger but when running off battery I have used it for hours on end while I'm working out in the garage to listen to a ball game. Even after 4 years the battery lasts long enough that I can get through football/baseball game without it dying. This is one of my favorite purchases from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: The best small speaker out there!
customer_reviews.text: Decided to write this review since I bought this almost five years ago. What a great small product by Monster! Great quality and awesome sounds coming from such a small speaker! I've taken this everywhere and everyone comments how loud and clear it is even when I max out the volume. It truly is one of the best even though now there are other portable speakers out there now in 2013. The battery has a good life and even after five years still going strong. Recommended: I tend to get more without using the bluetooth option for battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Manny Traveler

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING - BETTER THAN EXPECTED!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker packs such a large punch for it's size! Everything in the description was true. Battery time is great, I get anywhere from 4 to 8 hours of playback(4 if maximum volume, 8 if medium volume - and medium volume is plenty loud, maximum your neighbors will hear(if you live in condo or apartment, doubt someone would hear it in a house next door not connected. But anyways, this device is just great, charges fast, lasts a long time, bluetooth connects easy with any device(my droid phone, galaxy tab, iphones, etc, anything that has bluetooth!) Check out my review and demonstration of this product: [...]
customer_reviews.author: Earthling1984

customer_reviews.title: Big Fan
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife's aunt. We went to visit her and when we got to her house she had her iPhone in a bowl in the kitchen so she could hear it. She also talked about signing up for some service (cable/credit, not sure) where they were offering her an option for an iPhone speaker or an iPad as a gift. After she took us out to an expensive restaurant for dinner I was certain the right gift for her was this speaker. She absolutely loves it. Uses it every day. Sorry I don't have any more specific details but I believe this was the best option and she seems very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: G1AC0M0

customer_reviews.title: worth the money
customer_reviews.text: To me it sounds louder than the jawbone, though not as rich, but you don't notice it unless your in a quiet environment. The bass seemed fine, it's not a boombox but it plenty for that speaker. I even downloaded a equalizer, and it managed to thump its way off my cooler. I do have a problem with the bluetooth cutting out, and having to re-sync it now and then, but I think its my android, because it doesn't seem to do it, when playing off my friends iphone. Worth the price, considering no huge difference in sound and volume on the upper end speakers right now.
customer_reviews.author: hman

customer_reviews.title: Over the top nice
customer_reviews.text: I don't know why others have had problems with the speakerphone. I sound good, pauses music with a call. The bluetooth is class 1 (doesn't handle a lot of walls well), didn't expect it to. Built in battery can be charged while playing. Of course you cannot get window rattling bass from such a small box ;) And it can get LOUD enough to get the point across in a rather large area! Got a great price from an Amazon Trusted partner. Would buy again in a heart beat.
customer_reviews.author: Tcat

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: i bought this speaker for my bike rides to carry in my bike bag. it has decent depth of sound and volume is ok but it's directional. it plays loudest in the direction the speakers face and is considerably lower in any other direction. it can be used as a speaker phone which is pretty cool. i've read people use it for a room in their home or something similar. i definately would not recommend this speaker for that use. music quality is not THAT good. it's a decent speaker for my bike rides but in actuality i'd like something better.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: This is the one
customer_reviews.text: The reviews are right. The sound coming out of this thing is for real. Not going to fill a room but for a desk or small office it is perfect. Works great with an iPad for watching films and the music playback is superb. Perfect addition for the iPad, iPod Touch, iPhone and your Mac -- meaning it is quite versatile. Get it. Two tips: 1. You may want to adjust the music EQ (Settings > Music > EQ) in iOS to get the best sound. 2. The wireless range is a lot greater than expected. At least fifty feet. Maybe more.
customer_reviews.author: ASChin

customer_reviews.title: A little gem
customer_reviews.text: In order to boost sound volumn on the iPad, I bought this little gem. Easy to sync, and small enough to move around easily, I am rating it 5 stars. When I am doing house chores, including cooking that is loud, it can boost the volumn of podcasts above the dim. Fine for music though. I charge it every time before I use it to make sure it has enough juice to last through the podcast sometimes more than an hour. USB charging system. Note that one has to sync it every time you use it.
customer_reviews.author: PAG

customer_reviews.title: Decent sound at a great price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to take a little risk on saving $100. I'd heard the Jawbone Jambox and liked those, but thought this might be good enough for the price. Boy, was I right. I won't deny that the Jambox sounds a little better, but for the price the iClarityHD serves my purpose pretty well. I bought it to use when camping in a classic travel trailer that doesn't have a sound system, and have ended up using it a fair amount at home as well when we want music outdoors, etc.
customer_reviews.author: DKB

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth connection keeps failing!
customer_reviews.text: Just got it and set it up. Sounds wonderful for the price! However, how many times should I have to quickly push the power button to reconnect the bluetooth when the iPhone is sitting next to the device? I've had this thing on for maybe 3 hours and I've had to reconnect it about 20 times. It's not a power or distance or line of sight issue. Any suggestions? I'd like to keep it because I like the sound, but right now I can't justify the cost for something that requires my constant attention to make it function.
customer_reviews.author: Diane W.

customer_reviews.title: great deal
customer_reviews.text: I bought this speaker to replace an old cheap one that ate through AAA batteries like nothing else. So far it has been performing extremely well. It has good bass, tethers with my iPhone through bluetooth effortlessly, and gets pretty loud without distorting. The thing sounds awesome. I use it when I play racquetball and keep it in the back corner of the court. Yesterday I accidentally hit a ball straight into it and the speaker survived, not a scratch on it, pretty impressive!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this little guy because Im staying at a hotel for an extended period of time,its surpassed all my expectations. Its wireless which in this hotel is a plus and can be placed wherever I want,sound quality is awsome for its size and it works Great with my iphone.I opted for this one because... if I want to change the song thats playing, I do it from my iphone which is always close to me ANYWAY and the speaker can simply stay where its at. Pleased compare between this one and the other Monster iClarity HD (BLACK) to fit your needs. Good Luck, F. Lugo
customer_reviews.author: Freddie L

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound but Range Could be Better
customer_reviews.text: Ive been using this speaker for a year with my iPhones. Pros: Sound quality Loudness Portability Bluetooth- pairing is simple and it auto connects better than some of the others I've tried Battery life Cons: -Annoying bright blue light -If my phone is in my pocket, even within just a few feet of the speaker, it temporarily loses the connection. Once I move closer it corrects itself.
customer_reviews.author: TGR

customer_reviews.title: This little thing ROCKS!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried many micro speakers and you will not believe the sound that this little thing can produce! Keep in mind you won't get the SAME sound as a permanent speaker but if you have a laptop with bad speakers . like me this is the only way to go! Portable, I can listen to my ipod if I am outside grilling, or while taking a bath...I love it! No cable you can listen through bluetooth on your iphone. With my regular Ipod I use a 2.5 extension cable. Battery life is great, just plug into usb and you are good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little guy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the iClarityHD model for my daughter's ipod & ipad. This thing works great!!! Very easy to link via bluetooth. As a test, I synched it to my Samsung Galaxy S Android phone too without a hitch. Works great as a small room speaker & conference phone. Very portable as it has rechargeable lithium batteries. The iClarity version was $40 cheaper vs the Clarity version. I couldn't be happier with the price, order process & quickness in receiving the item.
customer_reviews.author: dman

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic speakers
customer_reviews.text: These speakers are really fantastic and work beautifully with both my iPad 2 and iPhone 4. The connectivity is great and the sound terrific. The rechargeable batteries last for hours and even though it doesn't come with an AC adapter, you can simply plug the USB charging cord into the base of an iPad charger and it charges easily from the wall AC socket without the need for a computer such as if traveling. You will not be disappointed. You can stream music from Pandora and use the iPad for other applications and it streams effortlessly and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Post

customer_reviews.title: Decent music quality, not a great speaker phone
customer_reviews.text: Decent quality sound. I use it in all sorts of odd places like my attic when I'm organizing. Battery lasts longer than I expected. As a speaker phone, it leaves a lot to be desired. I can hear from it ok, but folks on the other side have a little trouble hearing us around the table. Bummer, that's why I got it. Still useful for music, though.
customer_reviews.author: The Parrothead

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tested a bunch of different speakers and I'm not an audio snob, but that being said I am very happy with this little speaker. Just bought it last week and took it camnping this weekend. It paired with different devices easily and sounded great. The best part was the battery life. I got a solid 8 hours of play time off of a full charge at just under full volume. For the price, this is an awesome little speaker to have.
customer_reviews.author: NPF678

customer_reviews.title: Amazing value for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wow! I just received the speaker today and I'm blown away by how impressive the quality and volume of the sound is for such a small package. I used it for a small dinner party tonight and all of the guests were blown away too and they will run out and get their own. Excellent value for the price. You really can't go wrong with this product. Like other reviewers said, this can obviously not compete with a full size home theater but still be prepared to be blown away. I will recommend this product over and over again (and hopefully the price won't go up)!
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: I loved it so I bought two
customer_reviews.text: This works great with my iPhone and iPad. The volume is pretty good. Don't expect a loud base sound But It does what it needs to do. Be sure to read instructions because it doesn't automatically sink with devices, you have to press and hold on until device sinks. I have two one for work and one at home
customer_reviews.author: Vob

customer_reviews.title: very convenient and good sound for size
customer_reviews.text: As most of the reviewers wrote I agree, this was a good purchase. pros good sound for the size.(don't expect HUGE sound but good nonetheless) small size (you can take this ANYWHERE) travel, beach, garage, backyard, laptop bluetooth speakerphone works great looks nice cons can't handle too much bass but for the size, it's very sufficient
customer_reviews.author: bram17

customer_reviews.title: Great Portable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker that packs a punch for its size- the sound quality is very good, and it does get quite loud and still sounds great (for this class of speakers) at the same time. Bluetooth works very well, but I wouldn't recommend this as a speakerphone- Have not found one by any brand that does a really good job as a speakerphone except for a Polycom, but that's a professional-grade product.
customer_reviews.author: Sean310

customer_reviews.title: NOT as good as LOGI TECH mini boombox
customer_reviews.text: This is OK..........but pales in comparison to the Logitech mini boombox: The Logitech has: More control/function buttons (eg play/pause, skip etc) Better build quality and finish and appearance Better clarity at high volume Better base (rubber footings) The choice is clear....Logitech mini boombox
customer_reviews.author: Fern

customer_reviews.title: I like this speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Bluetooth speaker for my Android Galaxy Nexus and I love it. The hands free phone call option is especially convenient and easy to setup, as it sets itself up so long as your phone's compatible. My only surprise was its size, it was physically smaller than I thought it would be but for its size it has great sound.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my iPhone (Monster Clarity HD BLACK)
customer_reviews.text: Some reviewers mentioned trouble using this with the iPhone, but it works great for me. I keep it in my car and it really saves me on long trips. I use it to listen to audiobooks I've downloaded onto my iPhone. I only wish I could get it to work with my iPod nano. I tried connecting that with an audio cable and was unable to get any sound to come out.
customer_reviews.author: KDA

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Item!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this item and compared it to the popular and new "Jambone Jambox." I was so disappointed with the Jambox because it was so expensive and I felt it completely lacking in loudness...the one thing it supposedly had. It was a total ripoff at $200. I returned it 2 days later. This item is about the same size, a great design, half the price at $100, and has wonderful sound. It's not a Bose, but it's loud for its size and such a great addition to my iPad. I HIGHLY recommend this over other Bluetooth speakers...especially the Jambox.
customer_reviews.author: Alvaro

customer_reviews.title: Huge Value in a Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic little speaker. Great sound quality for the size. I was able to unpackage it and pair it with my iPhone in about 5 minutes. While I agree with other reviewers that the sound could be improved with an EQ app, mine sounded fine as is. I plan to use this in my bedroom and sitting on the window sill on nice days facing out the window to listen to music in the yard. I'm sure it will function just fine for those purposes. I may post more as I become familiar with the unit. Overall great value for the money! I'd buy it again for sure.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Cope

customer_reviews.title: Great for what it is supposed to be
customer_reviews.text: I have use it for both listening music and receiving calls and my conclusion is that it performs this tasks well Pros: It can be recharged through an USB port Phone calls quality was decent Very portable Cons It is not really a Con, per se, but just a limitation of an audio system of that size. The sound quality for listening Music is fair, but it is nothing thrilling.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Sassaki

customer_reviews.title: Works fine for the purpose
customer_reviews.text: Very small and portable speakers. The bass is okay, not great, but what do you expect from little speakers. The highs and mids are fine. It is way much better than the ipad or iphone speakers. Setting up the bluetooth is easy (less than 30 seconds). Sometime you have to set up the bluetooth connection, but no biggy.
customer_reviews.author: BoomerSooner

customer_reviews.title: good and loud
customer_reviews.text: You can hardly imagine that such a small speaker can be so loud. I live in a college single dorm room. And it's perfect for it. The bass is good too. It's easy to carry. Sometimes when the weather is good, i carry it out to the grass and read and listen to music. High recommended. But the price is too expensive now...don't know why. I got it for only 50 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Excelent little speaker!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just receive the speaker yesterday. Sound is much better than I expected. I use it with my Ipad 2 so I can listen to music around the house or just as a sound extension at work. At high level the speaker works just as fine as a mediums. low levels could be improved but overall, I am really happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Estupinan Rodriguez Jose David

customer_reviews.title: Good for the cost for sure
customer_reviews.text: Before i buy any equipment, i like reading all similar eq's reviews. I also decide to a price that i want to pay. For this type of product, $70 was my max. I paid $60 for this item an i am very happy having that. With my ipod, by trebble boost EQ, sound is very clear. It is not an HI-FI speaker but very nice to hear this little's sound while it performs its task. I like it very much, it is not the alarm clock speaker for sure ! there was a review saying that speaker sound is cheap ! i am against this comment ! sound is not cheap for its range and price.
customer_reviews.author: bazlama

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. I go between my iPad and my iPhone using it. It fills the room with good sound. I thought long and hard and researched many Bluetooth devices before taking a chance with this product. It's small and portable, just turn it on and put in on the counter or tuck it in a corner.
customer_reviews.author: Qbigfish

customer_reviews.title: This exact speaker is awesome
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is bannging omg luv this thing battery life blows most small speakers out of the water very loud and bluetooth don't constantly disconnect like most things out there bass is very good I would not use as a phone microphone in a noisy area other than that 5 stars baby!
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Monster iClarityHD Bluetooth Wireless Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I really like this little speaker, works great with Ipad, Iphone etc. I use with Ipad when doing presenations and need others to hear info from the Ipad rather from internet etc. and also like extending to listen to music, books or anything else outside of listening to the Ipad speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Love this thing, I had a jam box before well actually still have the jam box, while the jam box is cooler and looks nicer this monster I clarity has better sound better definition and better base. The battery life is about the same between the two
customer_reviews.author: Dr who likes toys, and gagets

customer_reviews.title: Very good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Good for the price. It's not UE Boom or Bose mini however works very well. I had this speaker for over three years and it still holds a good charge. The Bluetooth connects with no issues. I recommend it if your not looking to drop a lot of money.
customer_reviews.author: Brian D

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Lows are not as good as Jawbone Jam Box. But is very portable small in size, but delivers great sound, recieve phone calls through the speaker. adjust sound from speaker as well. Uses bluetooth or 3.5 mm jack for sound input. Well worth the money. For music, phone calls, videos, gaming, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Greg T

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!! Extremely delightful! Value for money!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought it online on Amazon.com when tested it with my Ipad2 the sound is incredibly delightful. Turn the volume to the max and still i get clarity sound that is so different than other portable small speakers which tends to breakup when reach its peak. Brought it to work and tested it to my colleagues other bluetooth enable devices such as samsung notes, sony xperia, nokia, motorola and even China handphones. The result? They all work seamlessly good!! Great product i must say and everyone of my friends wants to own one simply because of superb sound coming from a small wireless portable speaker. A job well done to Monster!!
customer_reviews.author: ZHRONE17

customer_reviews.title: So impressed!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just ordered this little speaker, I have to say I'm beyond impressed with its sound and presentation! I was really skeptical given the size of the speaker but honestly it performed excellently. Beyond a doubt highly recommended very solid product will buy again and again!!
customer_reviews.author: icesared79

customer_reviews.title: but the sound and quality is AMAZING. When my car radio wasn't working I hooked ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my most favorites things I own. It's so compact, but the sound and quality is AMAZING. When my car radio wasn't working I hooked this up to my cell and it did the trick. It's so awesome that I bought my bf and my sister one as well. Perfect if you want a good sound without taking up a lot of space.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Love it I use it every day it's small compact ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it I use it every day it's small compact and has a good sound for a small audience. Don't expect boom bass, but it works for the Kitchen speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Meh. Sounds like a small speaker.
customer_reviews.text: After reading all of the reviews I was expecting this to defy the laws of physics and produce a big sound from a small box. Only a small sound, though. Returning it to find a bigger box with a bigger sound. Otherwise nicely built, easy controls, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Occamman

customer_reviews.title: Monster iClarity HD Portable Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: First, I was drawn to the name, then, I asked the salesman to show me how it works/sounds. After that set up (which was very easy) I was totally sold on the item. It is a dream for me as I use in my office and my patio, it is the best! So portable but most of all is the sound and the power, Love it! Once you hear the sound it's a done deal. The price is more than comparable to I-home etc. I purchased it at Amazon because I could not find it in stock at my local electronics store plus the price was better.
customer_reviews.author: Lucky Lucy

customer_reviews.title: A dud
customer_reviews.text: While it worked, it was wonderful and then it didn't. I cleared the system, rebooted my phone-everything to no avail. Don't get. I gave it two stars because when it did work it was a cool little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: D. Baldwin

customer_reviews.title: This is a little monster
customer_reviews.text: I had a few speculations about these tiny speakers, since they appear to be so small, but looks are truly deceiving. These speakers can get very loud with crisp sound quality. The speaker phone also works great. I was up and running in less than a minute. Loving it. I highly recommend this little monster.
customer_reviews.author: DH

customer_reviews.title: Great sound in a little package
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this speaker system for use with my iPad and I am very impressed with the quality of the sound. The Bluetooth connection and small size were the features that originally attracted me to the iClarity HD. I would definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis E. Lafferty

customer_reviews.title: Good little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is smaller than I thought it would be which makes it great for traveling. Since I have a logitec Bluetooth to stereo adapter on my surround sound system, I don't use this much around the house. I'm at the beach right now and this speaker is coming in very handy to allow me to listen to the music from my iPhone. The sound quality is really good for the size and price. Very clear sound with surprising good bass. I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: Randall V. Hodge

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this tiny little speaker. Took a few minutes to figure out and then got it communicating with my new Dell computer. Are we talking super high fidelity? No. But its loud and clear and fits in the palm of your hand. No more wires all over the place. Watched a netflix video - perfect! The little unit is loud. If you are thinking about spending hundreds on a Bose try this first - you may be surprised. LED is bright - so??
customer_reviews.author: from parts Unknown

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable!
customer_reviews.text: It's amazing how such a small device deliver sound so clear and with the most important aspect to me, with bass. I was skeptical at first but I should of known that it was well worth it, because it was a monster product. For the price you really can't ask for more! I love it I have it pair with my iPad. I also try it with my android phone and that's when I noticed a huge drop in sound quality. If you own apple product this is the device for you!
customer_reviews.author: edarkness

customer_reviews.title: iclarity speaker rocks
customer_reviews.text: great quality product with a reasonable price tag. works great with the laptop, itouch, and 3ds game. took a little effort to setup the bluetooth function but too hard.
customer_reviews.author: Shana

customer_reviews.title: Louder than expected!!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a bit in the year due to work mostly and this lil thing comes with me every time, fills up a room just fine, great sound and very portable battery last a ton too!!
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Ortiz

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: I have used this speaker for several years without any problems. It has a clear, clean sound and can be used anywhere within the room. It goes with us on all of our vacations and works great with either my iPhone or iPad when playing iTunes! I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: Sound dropouts with iPhone 4
customer_reviews.text: Went back right away. The sound was intermittent even with the phone only 3 feet away. The only possible interference was a WIFI router that was over 40 feet away. It's not my phone because the phone works fine with another $20 bluetooth speaker. Probably just a defective unit, but I'm not going to waste any more time with this device. At max volume, it is very loud and can fill a large family room. There was no distortion at high volume but the bass was weak, even when the speak was place in a corner of the room.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Yee

customer_reviews.title: Great sound from a small package
customer_reviews.text: I gave this as a gift but got to hear it before it left and it sounded remarkably good, much better than I expected. I think it may be used more as a mobile unit than a desktop unit as I had envisioned.
customer_reviews.author: DRG

customer_reviews.title: it puts out good sound.
customer_reviews.text: For as small as this it, it puts out good sound.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Harrold

customer_reviews.title: Sweet little speaker with power
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bluetooth speaker I have run across. No problem connecting it with my MacBook Pro, iPad 2 or iPhone 4s. I want to say that it puts out better sound then my Bose Wave. It's worth ever dollar.
customer_reviews.author: B. Williams

customer_reviews.title: Monster iClarityHD Bluetooth Wireless Speaker (Silver)
customer_reviews.text: got one as a gift, since then, I've purchased these for my friends and family and overall, great sound from such a small speaker, great value, great gifts
customer_reviews.author: Shaman

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: I use this in my travels. The speakers in my laptop are really tinny sounding. I love this because it sounds great and it is so portable I can move the speaker with my as long as I stay in range.
customer_reviews.author: James B. Hendricks, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: This has become one of my most frequently used items. I absolutely love the sound quality. It linked easily to my iPod touch and my iPad. I use it in the garage, the kitchen, and the bathroom. I have only used it twice for phone calls and I was satisfied but I prefer it by far to play music and podcasts.
customer_reviews.author: S. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Great value, great sound
customer_reviews.text: Was really surprised with how good this thing sounds. The only quirky thing I found is the off switch in the back and the power switch on the side. To charge you must have the power switch in the "ON" position. Very strange. Other than that small curio, quite the mini marvel.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Harris

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for a little guy
customer_reviews.text: This is not Bose but for what it is and its size and price on Amazon you can't beat it. I use this with my gen 4 touch and I find it more convenient to use that my gen 1 touch and my Bose dock. I use this little guy more and I get to take it with me. This sounds better than my stock car system. I changed my mind on the pod adapter for my car stereo. When it comes to music I'm not a size queen. This little monster fits me just right.
customer_reviews.author: W Smith

customer_reviews.title: Try many, but It just doesn't work...
customer_reviews.text: I buy it and sent to friend's address, he received it and open the box, my friend use the ASUS eeePC and all his Apple devices to try to link the speaker, but it doesn't work, don't know why, return it after all test he can do. I must to complain the Monster bad quality control.
customer_reviews.author: Chih Chiang Shen

customer_reviews.title: good bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: works well. Don't use it that much anymore, could be a little bit louder. Not that much louder than my normal phone speakers
customer_reviews.author: S

customer_reviews.title: rat396
customer_reviews.text: Nice bluetooth for the money. Great sound from something this small. Great for your home office or your desk at work. This is not meant to replace your stereo system or DJ a party. Great product and performed as written.
customer_reviews.author: rat396

customer_reviews.title: Defective units--twice!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this speaker until I charged it up for the first time, turned it off, and then tried to turn it on again. Nothing. No LED light ever came back on, and no sound could be produced, whether or not it was connected to the charger. Returned the unit immediately for a replacement, and the replacement unit had precisely the same problem. It has to go back, too. I see from other reviews that I'm not the only one to experience this. Too bad, would have been perfect if it had continued working beyond one day!
customer_reviews.author: CarolynG

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I really really love this speaker and has been very very dependable product.
customer_reviews.author: RON L BURROUGHS Sr

customer_reviews.title: iclarity monster
customer_reviews.text: I got this product ordered, after a day of delay in shipment i got it. Overall quality can be said as ok.. but not so good if you expect some bass, it totally fails to voice the drums on it speakers, totally feels like the filters are torn. Apart from that connectivity is good and as detailed in prod info. Good for some low voice hearing Final conclusion : totally dissatisfied withthe bass effect, even if was xpected low, but it performs beyond low
customer_reviews.author: kp

customer_reviews.title: Easy and impressive.
customer_reviews.text: This nearly palm-sized speaker delivers surprisingly good sound and is very easy to set up and use. Recharges via USB which is convenient. Very decent range as well - I walked around my house with my iPhone with very little drop out. I wish it had a little more ummph but it gets nicely loud. I recommend this item.
customer_reviews.author: Orin Ketyer

customer_reviews.title: Big sound from a small device
customer_reviews.text: Works great with my iPhone 5 for music. Be aware though that you might be disappointed with it in your car with the car noise.
customer_reviews.author: njdude

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, great quality
customer_reviews.text: For its size its really loud. Also good bass and easy connection. Built quality is also good. You can use it as a hands free speaker too. Iam using it with my iphone 4 and laptop with no problem. I would definately recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mcbilal

customer_reviews.title: Travel buddy.
customer_reviews.text: We take this when we travel, it is perfect for the beach. We even use it at home when we are in the hot tub. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, volume
customer_reviews.text: This is a compact speaker with great volume and sound. Bluetooth connectivity along with its size makes this speaker excellent for traveling as well.
customer_reviews.author: RLC

customer_reviews.title: Monster iClarity review
customer_reviews.text: I got the Monster iClarity bluetooth speaker a few weeks ago and it lived up to it's promise of excellent sound. The only setback was the speakerphone functionality, the person I was talking to said that my voice had an echo. Also, when I'm listening to music, the song would sometimes skip. I think it was the bluetooth connection faltering somehow.
customer_reviews.author: Greg

customer_reviews.title: Great sound, kind of a pain to set up
customer_reviews.text: Once it's set up, it's great. Terrific sound, but it's kind of a pain to set up. The directions just aren't as clear as they could and should be.
customer_reviews.author: Andy McPhee

customer_reviews.title: Great for it's size
customer_reviews.text: I read alot of reviews and this was an impulse buy for me. It does put out quality sound for such a small device. Higly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Donony

customer_reviews.title: great sound
customer_reviews.text: love the sound off the Monster loud for size hold charge great the blue tooth is fine some phones dont do as well as others
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Good speakers for a kids room
customer_reviews.text: kids love it. It is small non-intrusive form and performs well for a room. con: Rechargeable battery does not retain charge overnight.
customer_reviews.author: ashah

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker and features for the money
customer_reviews.text: Despite my hesitance to purchase a non-Bose speaker product, I am pleasantly surprised by the sound quality and features of this speaker. I intend to purchase additional speakers for family and friends 0 great product at a great price!
customer_reviews.author: Shooting in IN

customer_reviews.title: Big sound
customer_reviews.text: Extremely pleased and pleasantly surprised by the big sound from this small speaker. No problems pairing with my iPad and iPhone. Great sound. Bluetooth connection is very convienient.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: I love this. So easy to take with you everywhere and such good sound comes out of it. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Millard

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, great price
customer_reviews.text: Great soudning speakers at a much lower price than the Jawbone version.
customer_reviews.author: Steinbrew

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound from a little box
customer_reviews.text: I really recommend this item if you want a great sound for a low price and a portable of how i would call, a mini boombox. Really is amazing the clarity of the sound and it works great with bluetooth. I use it with my Samsung Galaxy S2 and I am very proud of buying it. Recommended for all the people who love music and clearness of sound.
customer_reviews.author: LuisF

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great!
customer_reviews.text: Speaker arrived very quickly. All I can say is wow! Paired effortlessly with my Droid X. Sound is incredible. Very easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with the size, sound quality and price. It has performed well and held up great for over a year.
customer_reviews.author: chemrunner

customer_reviews.title: Great Little Speaker
customer_reviews.text: I've had this speaker a couple of weeks and am quite pleased. It provides all the volume you might want and the sound quality is surprisingly good.
customer_reviews.author: WilJ

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a good product and I really enjoy the one I have. My son has one of the black ones and his has an additional button on the side that mine doesn't have. This was not made clear when I ordered even though there was a considerable difference in the price of the two speakers that I didn't understand. Nevertheless, I would recommend this product to anyone wanting a good quality speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Lighthouse lassie

customer_reviews.title: Five stars all day!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful Product! Great sound! Great look! Battery lasts a long time! I can't say anything bad about these speakers! I would recommend these to anyone. And the price is also right on!
customer_reviews.author: J. H. Curtis

customer_reviews.title: I love it. I've had it for 3 years and ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I've had it for 3 years and the sound and the battery still working perfectly. I live it.
customer_reviews.author: Mira

customer_reviews.title: Just a little guy.
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker bumps hard. compact and portable with super clear sound and easy to connect via bluetooth or AUX cable. Charges really fast and holds its charge for a long time, my phone where the music was coming from lost battery before the speaker did. no complaints yet and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Quigley

customer_reviews.title: Big sound in a little package
customer_reviews.text: I was a little worried that the sound would not be what I wanted but I was wrong. I love this new toy. I watch movies on my Ipad and listen to pandora on my iphone at work. I would buy thia again and again.
customer_reviews.author: RN

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Heat little speaker, we use it in the car with my iPhone and in the house to listen to audiobooks.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Barnes

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Sound
customer_reviews.text: Have owned this for about 2+ years and it's still going strong. The sound is awesome and the battery life is great. Easily links via bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: O. Burgos

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound gadget!
customer_reviews.text: A must have for all music fans.. Very good sound quality and battery life. Just the point that the battery cable dont have the connector, just the cable. So I`m using my iphone conector to plug at the wall. But the rest just good points to say... Good price for that product.
customer_reviews.author: Armando

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This item is great! Portable, great sound, you can use it just about anywhere. Easy to use, I use it every day.
customer_reviews.author: Jo-Ann

customer_reviews.title: bluetooth wireless speaker
customer_reviews.text: this little speaker is amazing! I love it and highly recommend to friends!!! Three have already purchased the identical product!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good
customer_reviews.text: No complaints about this prosuct, sounds good, and has good battery life, would be nice to know WHAT the battery level is at (10%? 30%? 90%?) but other than that its great
customer_reviews.author: TJim

customer_reviews.title: MONSTER CLARITY HD-BLUETOOTH SPEAKER
customer_reviews.text: This one was a gift to my relative. I loved mine so much. Excellent sound and voice quality. Great for jammin tunes while in the shower, on the deck or just talking, great voice quality. The price has risen since I bought mine, so it must be in high demand. Mike.
customer_reviews.author: M.F.

customer_reviews.title: Love this Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to use in My Wife's golf cart. Mounted it hanging from the roof. Excellent sound quality when used with her phone. Excellent buy for under $40.
customer_reviews.author: Charles J. Horsley

product_meta.title: Monster iClarityHD Bluetooth Wireless Speaker (Silver) (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
Color:Silver| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingGet amazing room filling stereo sound from this incredibly small, portable speaker. Wirelessly connect iClarityHD Precision Micro Bluetooth Speaker to your Bluetooth equipped iPod® touch, iPad™, iPhone™ or Mac. It also acts as a speakerphone for hands-free calls on iPhone and for chats on Skype using iPad, iPod touch or your Mac. Also features a 3.5 mm input for listening to music from any device with a standard headphone port.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Listen in High Definition to your Blackberry or PC while on the go
Never before has such big sound come from such a small package. Just connect your Blackberry or PC via Bluetooth or 3.5 mm minijack cable and enjoy unbelievably clear, room filling music. 


Ultra-Clear Noise-canceling Bluetooth Speakerphone for Hands-free Calls and Video Chat
ClarityHD Precision Micro Bluetooth Speaker is an incredibly flexible wireless speakerphone solution. You'll get near lifelike hands-free calls on your Blackberry and even for Skype or iChat voice/video chats on your Bluetooth equipped PC. The built-in mic with advanced noise-canceling let's you use it for instant conference calls in the office—or anywhere you are. You can even use it in your car and still be clearly heard. 



Portability that Gives You the Ultimate in Convenience
Small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, ClarityHD Precision Micro Bluetooth Speaker stores easily in your laptop bag or luggage. It’s the perfect mobile solution for enjoying hands-free calling and incredible sounding music on the go. 







COMPATIBILITY:
Wireless: Devices with Bluetooth 2.0 or above (See General Specifications for profiles) 
Wired: Devices with a standard 3.5 mm headphone port 
Connects via Bluetooth to: Blackberry and Bluetooth equipped PC and most Bluetooth equipped smartphones or computers 
Connects to any device with a headphone port via 3.5 mm minijack cable (not included) 

WHAT'S INCLUDED:
ClarityHD Precision Micro Bluetooth Speaker 100
Travel Pouch
USB Charging Cable
User Manual


GENERAL SPECIFICATIONS:
Bluetooth v2.0 includes profiles: A2DP, AVRCP, HFP, HSP
Advanced Audio Distribution Profile (A2DP) for wireless music streaming
Audio Video Remote Control Profile (AVRCP) for wireless audio and video playback control
Hands-free Audio (HFP) and Headset Profiles (HSP) for hands-free calling
Range up to 33 FT (10 M)
feature_bullets: Ultra-Compact, High-Performance Bluetooth Speaker Delivers Best-In-Class Wireless Stereo Sound
Built-In Microphone With Advanced Noise Cancellation Enables Clear Wireless Hands-Free Calling & Conferencing.
Rechargeable Li-Ion Batteries Power Up To 5 Hours Of Play Time At Full Volume On A Single Charge
Ultra-compact, high performance bluetooth speaker and speakerphone in the palm of your hand
Two 35 mm full range drivers gives you music incredible fidelity in the mid and high frequencies
Monster Passive Radiator Subwoofer for deep, clean and tight bass
Bluetooth 2.0 audio and digital signal processing for superior sound quality in a compact design
Up to 5 hour playtime with Lithium Ion rechargeable batteries
